title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 101.5 - Payments for moving and related expenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 101.5 - Payments for moving and related expenses

State Regulations
(a) The Commissioner of Transportation adopts
sections 24.301 and 24.303 through
24.306
of title 49 of the Code of Federal

Regulations with the same force and effect as though herein fully set forth at
length. (b) The Commissioner of

Transportation adopts section
24.302
of title 49 of the Code of Federal

Regulations with the same force and effect as though herein
fully set forth at length with the following additional provision that the
department may pay such other amounts consistent with Federal reimbursement
rates if the commissioner determines such amounts to be appropriate for use by
the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
101.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
